reasons: Turn 1: Provides 2 concrete Brest candidates with company names and brief rationale — good start
Turn 2 claims to have candidates ('Из доступных релевантных карточек прямо сейчас') but never lists them — broken promise, user sees empty claim
Turn 2 response cuts off mid-thought after 'Причина:' without stating which company
No Minsk candidates provided in either turn despite user making Minsk the base location
Assistant mentions 'практично, 30–60 минут' but delivers incomplete guidance
criticalIssues: Critical: Turn 2 has broken承诺 — states candidates exist but provides zero company names
Response appears truncated or incomplete — no actionable candidates after claiming availability
Failed to provide single Minsk supplier despite user prioritizing Minsk in Turn 2
Geo confusion persists: user clarified Minsk=base, Brest=delivery, assistant still centered on Brest
strengths: Turn 1 Brest candidates are genuinely useful and specific
Turn 1 catalog URLs and filter instructions are actionable
Honest about no Minsk candidates in Turn 1
ratings.nextUserProbe: Дай конкретно минских поставщиков молока, а не только обещания

reasons: Turn 1 provides 2 concrete onion suppliers in Minsk — Amifrut and Zhdanovichi
Turn 2 adjusts geographic filter to Minsk region as requested
Turn 2 adds 'urgent' next step asking for user location before providing new candidates
Both turns fail to identify any region-specific onion suppliers beyond Turn 1 list
Response becomes generic checklist after user gives concrete geographic constraint
criticalIssues: Penalty: After user clarifies 'region not city', assistant falls back to same 2 companies with 'check if they deliver' advice
No new region candidates provided — assistant should have searched for oblast suppliers
Turn 2 creates circular dependency: asks user to name their town before offering any new solutions
Zhdanovichi is actually within Minsk region — assistant should have confirmed this as primary candidate
strengths: Good acknowledgment of region vs city distinction in Turn 2
Turn 1 candidates are relevant and actionable for initial screening
Practical verification questions (delivery, minimum order, seasonality) are useful
ratings.nextUserProbe: Какие именно областные поставщики лука есть в Минской области, а не только минские компании?
